statements.select:
select t1.*, t2.MAJOR_TYPE_NAME, t3.MINOR_TYPE_NAME from SBE_EQUIP t1 left join SBE_EQUIP_MAJOR_TYPE t2 on t1.MAJOR_TYPE_ID = t2.OBJID left join SBE_EQUIP_MINOR_TYPE t3 on t1.MINOR_TYPE_ID = t3.OBJID where t1.DELETE_FLAG = 0
t1.MAJOR_TYPE_ID = #where.MAJOR_TYPE_ID#
t1.MINOR_TYPE_ID = #where.MINOR_TYPE_ID#
t1.EQUIP_NAME like '%' || #where.EQUIP_NAME# || '%'
t1.EQUIP_CODE like '%' || #where.EQUIP_CODE# || '%'
order by $OrderString$

select t1.OBJID sskey,t1.MAJOR_TYPE_NAME ssValue from SBE_EQUIP_MAJOR_TYPE t1 where t1.DELETE_FLAG = '0' and t1.objid=41
order by t1.OBJID

select t1.OBJID sskey,t1.MINOR_TYPE_NAME ssValue from SBE_EQUIP_MINOR_TYPE t1 where t1.DELETE_FLAG = '0' and t1.major_type_id=41
ORDER BY $OrderString$
order by t1.OBJID
